Take a snapshot of a page

spans.text: Take a snapshot of a page

lines.text: You can use the Snapshot tool to copy all selected content (text, images, or both) to the

spans.text: You can use the Snapshot tool to copy all selected content (text, images, or both) to the

lines.text: clipboard or another application. Text and images are copied as an image.

spans.text: clipboard or another application. Text and images are copied as an image.

lines.text: You can use two methods to take a snapshot: the Select or Snapshot tools. Using the Select
